    • getResultsHander

      public void getResultsHander(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Calls inventory methods that search the parts list for a part that contains a search term entered by the user. The parts table is changed to include only relevant parts
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • getResultsProductHander

      public void getResultsProductHander(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Calls inventory methods that search the Product list for a Product that contains a search term entered by the user. The parts table is changed to include only relevant Products

      actionEvent -
